screen_desc: The screenshot shows the home screen of a smartphone with a pink gradient wallpaper. At the top, the status bar displays the time as 3:38, notification icons, and the current temperature of 61°F. Below that, there is a date widget displaying "Monday, Aug 22." The screen includes three app icons: Google Maps, Messages, and Chrome, along with a Google search bar at the bottom. Navigation buttons for going back, going home, and recent apps are visible at the very bottom.

Search for 'DoorDash - Food Delivery' in the app list.
Locate the app and select the option to uninstall it.
action_desc: Swipe up from the bottom of the screen to open the app drawer.
action_result: By scrolling up, the app list has moved upward, revealing more apps on the screen. As a result, the app "DoorDash - Food Delivery" is now visible in the list. This action brings us one step closer to completing your request, as we can now select and uninstall "DoorDash - Food Delivery" from the list of apps.
